mapper.select: SELECT market_id AS id, name, intro, contactable_time AS contactableTime, policy, precaution, open_status AS openStatus, member_id AS "member.id", image_src AS imageUrl FROM market FULL OUTER JOIN image USING (member_id) WHERE market_id = #{marketId} OR category_id = 'MIMG'

SELECT market_id AS id, name, intro, contactable_time AS contactableTime, policy, precaution, open_status AS openStatus, member_id AS "member.id", image_src AS imageUrl FROM market FULL OUTER JOIN image USING (member_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} OR category_id = 'MIMG'
mapper.insert: SELECT market_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO market (market_id, name, intro, contactable_time, policy, precaution, open_status, member_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{intro}, #{contactableTime}, #{policy}, #{precaution}, #{openStatus}, #{member.id})
INSERT INTO image (image_src, member_id, category_id) VALUES (#{imageUrl}, #{member.id}, 'MIMG')
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM image WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND category_id = 'MIMG'
